00026 #ifndef http_response_h
00027 #define http_response_h

00029 #include <stdio.h>

00032 #include <iostream>
00033 #include <algorithm>

00036 #ifndef response_h
00037 #include "Response.h"
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifndef _debug_h
00041 #include "debug.h"
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 extern int dods_keep_temps; // defined in HTTPConnect.cc
00045 
00049 class HTTPResponse : public Response {
00050 private:
00051     vector<string> *d_headers;  // Response headers
00052     string d_file;      // Temp file that holds response body
00053 
00054 protected:
00057     HTTPResponse() {}
00058     HTTPResponse(const HTTPResponse &rs) {}
00059     HTTPResponse &operator=(const HTTPResponse &rhs) {
00060     throw InternalErr(__FILE__, __LINE__, "Unimplemented assignment");
00061     }
00063 
00064 public:
00080     HTTPResponse(FILE *s, vector<string> *h, const string &temp_file) 
00081     : Response(s), d_headers(h), d_file(temp_file) {
00082     DBG(cerr << "Headers: " << endl);
00083     DBGN(copy(d_headers->begin(), d_headers->end(),
00084           ostream_iterator<string>(cerr, "\n")));
00085     DBGN(cerr << "end of headers." << endl);
00086     }
00087 
00091     virtual ~HTTPResponse() {
00092     DBG(cerr << "Freeing HTTPConnect resources (" + d_file + ")... ");
00093 
00094     if (!dods_keep_temps && !d_file.empty())
00095         unlink(d_file.c_str());
00096 
00097     delete d_headers; d_headers = 0;
00098 
00099     DBGN(cerr << endl);
00100     }
00103     virtual vector<string> *get_headers() const { return d_headers; }
00105 
00108     virtual void set_headers(vector<string> *h) { d_headers = h; }
00110 };
